title: After My Ex-Boyfriend’s White Moonlight Proposed to Me - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Romance   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Apathetic Protagonist   Artists   Calm Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Family Conflict   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Movies   Past Trauma   Wealthy Characters
author: 恭十一
description:
Xie Ning knew that his boyfriend was a scumbag, and looked at him thinking of his white moonlight, and caught him with a little fox in bed. 

After breaking through the adultery between his boyfriend and the little fox, his boyfriend became an ex-boyfriend. Who expected his ex-boyfriend’s white moonlight coincidentally just returned to China, and everyone around Xie Ning looked at him with sympathy.

Xie Ning   : “...”

Xie Ning   : “No, I really dumped the scumbag.”


One day, his ex-boyfriend’s white moonlight suddenly proposed to him. 

Everyone : !

Xie Ning   : ?>
